description: DEMOLITION OF EXISTING BUILDINGS (TOTAL FLOORSPACE 8,587.5 SQ.M) AND THE ERECTION OF: - 1.	A NON-FOOD RETAIL STORE ON TWO FLOORS WITH AND INTERNAL SALES AREA OF 10,600 SQ.M AND AN EXTERNAL SALES AREA OF 2,570 SQ.M INCLUDING ANCILLARY CAF, OFFICES, SERVICING AND DELIVERY AREAS (TOTAL FLOORSPACE 19,337 SQ.M - GROSS EXTERNAL) WITH 438 PARKING SPACES AT GROUND FLOOR LEVEL; 2.	FOUR RETAIL UNITS (385 SQ.M - GROSS INTERNAL) FRONTING BURLINGTON ROAD; 3.	52 RESIDENTIAL UNITS (34 X 2 BEDROOM AND 18 X 1 BEDROOM ON GROUND AND FOUR FLOORS ABOVE WITH 44 CAR PARKING SPACES; 4.	ALTERATIONS TO VEHICLE ACCESS INCLUDING PROVISION OF REMODELLED ENTRANCE/EXIT FRONTING SLIP ROAD TO A3 AND REMOVAL OF EXISTING ENTRANCE TO RETAIL UNITS TO SOUTH; PROVISION OF EXIT TO STORE CAR PARK AND ENTRANCE/EXIT TO RESIDENTIAL UNITS FRONTING BURLINGTON ROAD; VEHICLE ACCESS TO SERVICE AREA/GOODS DELIVERY AREA TO NORTH OF SITE BETWEEN SHANNON COMERCIAL CENTRE AND WYVERN ESTATE.
